title: Council Implementing Regulation (EU) No 1049/2011 of 20 October 2011 implementing Article 11(1) of Regulation (EU) No 753/2011 concerning restrictive measures directed against certain individuals, groups, undertakings and entities in view of the situation in Afghanistan
header:
21.10.2011 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 276/2
COUNCIL IMPLEMENTING REGULATION (EU) No 1049/2011
of 20 October 2011
implementing Article 11(1) of Regulation (EU) No 753/2011 concerning restrictive measures directed against certain individuals, groups, undertakings and entities in view of the situation in Afghanistan
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union, and in particular Article 215(2) thereof,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EU) No 753/2011 of 1 August 2011 concerning restrictive measures directed against certain individuals, groups, undertakings and entities in view of the situation in Afghanistan (1), and in particular Article 11 (1) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) On 1 August 2011, the Council adopted Regulation (EU) No 753/2011.
(2) On 4 October 2011, the United Nations Security Council Committee, established pursuant to paragraph 30 of Security Council Resolution 1988 (2011), approved the addition of three persons to the list of individuals, groups, undertakings and entities subject to restrictive measures.
(3) Annex I to Regulation (EU) No 753/2011 should be amended accordingly,
main_body: The persons listed in the Annex to this Regulation shall be added to the list set out in Annex I of Regulation (EU) No 753/2011.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Union.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 20 October 2011.
For the Council
The President
M. SAWICKI
(1)  OJ L 199, 2.8.2011, p. 1.
ANNEX
LIST OF PERSONS REFERRED TO IN ARTICLE 1
(1) Faizullah Noorzai Akhtar Mohammed Mira Khan (alias: (a) Hajji Faizullah Khan Noorzai, (b) Haji Faizuulah Khan Norezai, (c) Haji Faizullah Khan, (d) Haji Fiazullah Khan, (e) Haji Faizullah Khan Noori, (f) Haji Faizullah Noor, (g) Haji Pazullah Noorzai, (h) Haji Mullah Faizullah).
(2) Malik Noorzai (alias: (a) Hajji Malik Noorzai, (b) Hajji Malak Noorzai, (c) Haji Malek Noorzai, (d) Haji Maluk, (e) Haji Aminullah).
(3) Abdul Aziz Abbasin (alias: Abdul Aziz Mahsud).
